text: Carlos Roberto PenaVega (né Pena Jr.; born August 15, 1989) is an American actor and singer. He was the star on Big Time Rush as Carlos García. He voices Bobby Santiago in The Loud House and its spin-off, The Casagrandes. He is a member of the Big Time Rush band. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:American pop singers Category:American pop musicians Category:American guitarists Category:American pianists Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Missouri Category:Musicians from Missouri Category:Singers from Missouri Category:People from Columbia, Missouri Category:Big Time Rush members
title: Carlos PenaVega
